title: Banned Time
body:
So I click on a champion to ban last second but because I don't click the ban button I get kicked back to the main screen. After 5 mins of clicking to re-queue and nothing happening it finally says you have dodged too many games and you now need to wait 30 mins. Fuck this new system. Who fucking cares if I click the ban button or not, I clicked the champ I wanted to ban. Lock that shit in auto like it used to. Also 30 mins for missing a single ban select? WTF is that. Why am I required to even ban. First punishment 30 fucking mins. That's complete horseshit.
I spent over 40 mins to even get a game there was that many people forgetting to lock in their champ select.
Goto be the worst decision made so far by Riot. Just a terrible new system. 
I do like the new champ select method just not this BS about getting kicked back if you don't press lock in.

replies.body: Just try banning the champ by locking it in. You can do it.

The ban lock in is there so you have the chance to tell someone not to ban that champion.
I don't agree with the lock in changes personally but I can see their reasoning behind them. It will get better with time as people remember to lock in.
